#summary Projects using pyBox2D

=== Libraries ===

 * [http://elements.linuxuser.at/ Elements] Work in progress simplified physics API
 * [http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Physics_(activity) OLPC Physics Activity] Basis for the OLPC Physics [http://developers.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=08/08/18/2258228 Game Jam]

=== Games ===

 * [http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/2008/08/10/junktowers-final/ Junktowers] by Papper, his submission to the 48 hour solo game development competition [http://www.ludumdare.com/ Ludum Dare]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gamecomp/ NaN]'s The day mom tied us together, fun and innovative little side scroller (with a cool intro) ([http://www.pyweek.org/e/NaN7/ PyWeek page])
 
=== Physics Jam Results ===

The OLPC Physics jam took place on Aug 29-31, 2008. The results from the groups are here:

 * [http://rollcats.com/ Rollcats]
 * [http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Bridge Bridge]
 * [http://wiki.laptop.org/go/XOlympics XOlympics]
